SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, imagePath, name, title, writer, viewCount, a.regdate FROM board_adopt a INNER JOIN shelter ON writer = id
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM board_adopt INNER JOIN shelter ON writer = id

SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, name, title, viewCount, writer, breed, petName, petAge, petGender, vaccination, neutralization, findDate, caption, imagePath, a.regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_adopt a INNER JOIN shelter ON writer = id
) WHERE num = #{num}
